name: sawahlunto.net
body:
### Welcome to sawahlunto.Net
Thanks for visiting this site.

If you wish to have an email address with this domain extension, you may see below.

### About
This site has nothing to do with anything or everything.
This is only Sawahlunto.Net.

We are also on http://facebook.com/sawahlunto and http://twitter.com/sawahlunto

### Free Email
We provide free email address with extention at `*.sawahlunto.Net`.

E.g. `TEST at sawahlunto.Net` or `TEST at ANYTHING.sawahlunto.Net`

If you would want one, you can contact `admin at sawahlunto.Net`.

The email is delivered using Google Apps from Google.
You can access the email at http://mail.sawahlunto.net

We also provide email with extension `sawahlunto.org`.

### Contact
If you want to contact sawahlunto.net, please send email to `admin at sawahlunto.net`.

Visit Sawahlunto, West Sumatera, Indonesia.


```
All right reserved Â© 2013 Sawahlunto.Net.
Last edit on July 2013.
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
